39 #include <ros_pioneer/pioneer_driver.h>
40 #include <ros/package.h>

46 namespace ros_pioneer {
47 
48 PioneerDriver::PioneerDriver()
49 {
50  ros::NodeHandle nh("~");
51  std::string serial_port, hostname;
52  int tcp_port;
53  nh.param("serial_port", serial_port, std::string("/dev/ttyS0"));
54  nh.param("hostname", hostname, std::string("localhost"));
55  nh.param("tcp_port", tcp_port, 8101);
56  // First Initialize Network Connection
57  if (!initTCP(hostname,tcp_port))
58  initSerial(serial_port);
59  sendOpen();
60  sendEnable(true);
61  sendPulse();
62  // load configuration file
63  std::string config_path = ros::package::getPath("ros_pioneer");
64  config_path.append("/config/param/" + subtype_ + ".p");
65  this->loadConfig(config_path);
66 }
67 
68 PioneerDriver::~PioneerDriver()
69 {
70  this->closeConnection();
71 }
72 
73 bool PioneerDriver::initSerial(const std::string &serial_port)
74 {
75  file_descriptor_ = -1;
76  int flags;
77  int baudrates[] = {B9600, B19200, B38400, B57600, B115200};
78  int cur_br = 0;
79  termios newtio;
80 
81  ROS_INFO("Openning serial port %s", serial_port.c_str());
82 
83  file_descriptor_ = open(serial_port.c_str(),
84  O_RDWR | O_SYNC | O_NONBLOCK, S_IRUSR | S_IWUSR);
85  if (file_descriptor_ < 0)
86  {
87  ROS_ERROR("Failed to open serial port %s", serial_port.c_str());
88  return false;
89  }
90 
91  if (!getSerialSettings(newtio))
92  return false;
93 
94  cfmakeraw(&newtio);
95  setSerialSpeed(newtio, baudrates[cur_br]);
96 
97  if (!setSerialSettings(newtio))
98  return false;
99 
100  if (!getSerialDescriptorFlags(flags))
101  return false;
102 
103  PioneerPacket packet;
104  while (!synchronize(packet))
105  {
106  cur_br++;
107  if (cur_br == 5)
108  {
109  ROS_ERROR("Could not initialize connection");
110  return false;
111  }
112  setSerialSpeed(newtio,baudrates[cur_br]);
113  setSerialSettings(newtio);
114  }
115  ROS_INFO("Synchronized");
116  this->parseSynchronizationPacket(packet);
117  ROS_INFO("Connected to a %s %s named %s",
118  type_.c_str(),
119  subtype_.c_str(),
120  name_.c_str());
121  return true;
122 }
123 
124 bool PioneerDriver::initTCP(const std::string &hostname,
125  const int port)
126 {
127  file_descriptor_ = -1;
128  int flags;
129  sockaddr_in sockaddress;
130  hostent hostinfo;
131 
132  bzero(&sockaddress, sizeof(sockaddress));
133  sockaddress.sin_family = AF_INET;
134  hostinfo = *gethostbyname(hostname.c_str());
135 
136  // set port number
137  sockaddress.sin_port = htons(port);
138 
139  file_descriptor_ = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0);
140  if (file_descriptor_ < 0)
141  {
142  ROS_ERROR("Failed to open TCP port %hu to %s", port, hostname.c_str());
143  return false;
144  }
145 
146  if (!getStatusFlags(flags))
147  return false;
148 
149  flags |= FD_CLOEXEC | IPPROTO_TCP | TCP_NODELAY;
150 
151  if (!setStatusFlags(flags))
152  return false;
153 
154  int status = connect(file_descriptor_,
155  reinterpret_cast<const sockaddr*>(&sockaddress),
156  sizeof(sockaddress));
157  if (status < 0)
158  {
159  switch (errno)
160  {
161  case ECONNREFUSED:
162  ROS_ERROR("Connection refused");
163  break;
164  case ENETUNREACH:
165  ROS_ERROR("No route to host");
166  break;
167  default:
168  ROS_ERROR("NetFail");
169  break;
170  }
171  closeConnection();
172  }
173 
174  PioneerPacket packet;
175  ROS_INFO("Starting synchronization");
176  while (!synchronize(packet))
177  ROS_ERROR("Could not synchronize, retrying");
178  ROS_INFO("Synchronized");
179  this->parseSynchronizationPacket(packet);
180  ROS_INFO("Connected to a %s %s named %s",
181  type_.c_str(),
182  subtype_.c_str(),
183  name_.c_str());
184  return true;
185 }
186 
187 void PioneerDriver::loadConfig(const std::string &filename)
188 {
189  config_.loadFile(filename);
190 }
191 
192 bool PioneerDriver::getSerialSettings(termios &settings)
193 {
194  // Get the serial connection attributes
195  int status;
196  status = tcgetattr(file_descriptor_, &settings);
197  if (status < 0)
198  {
199  ROS_ERROR("Failed to get connection attributes");
200  return false;
201  }
202  return true;
203 }
204 
205 bool PioneerDriver::setSerialSettings(const termios &settings)
206 {
207  // Set the serial connection attributes
208  int status;
209  status = tcsetattr(file_descriptor_, TCSAFLUSH, &settings);
210  if (status < 0)
211  {
212  ROS_ERROR("Failed to set connection attributes");
213  return false;
214  }
215 
216  if (!flushSerial())
217  return false;
218  return true;
219 }
220 
221 bool PioneerDriver::flushSerial()
222 {
223  int status;
224  // Flush the input and output streams
225  status = tcflush(file_descriptor_, TCIOFLUSH);
226  if (status < 0)
227  {
228  ROS_ERROR("Failed to flush the input and output streams");
229  return false;
230  }
231  return true;
232 }
233 
234 bool PioneerDriver::getSerialDescriptorFlags(int &flags)
235 {
236  // Get the flags
237  flags = fcntl(file_descriptor_, F_GETFL);
238  if (flags < 0)
239  {
240  ROS_ERROR("Failed to get the descriptor flags");
241  return false;
242  }
243  return true;
244 }
245 
246 bool PioneerDriver::setSerialDescriptorFlags(int &flags)
247 {
248  int status;
249  status = fcntl(file_descriptor_, F_SETFL, flags);
250  if (status < 0)
251  {
252  ROS_ERROR("Failed to set the descriptor flags");
253  return false;
254  }
255 }

257 bool PioneerDriver::getStatusFlags(int &flags)
258 {
259  // Get the flags
260  flags = fcntl(file_descriptor_, F_GETFD);
261  if (flags < 0)
262  {
263  ROS_ERROR("Failed to get the status flags");
264  return false;
265  }
266  return true;
267 }
268 
269 bool PioneerDriver::setStatusFlags(const int &flags)
270 {
271  int status;
272  status = fcntl(file_descriptor_, F_SETFD, flags);
273  if (status < 0)
274  {
275  ROS_ERROR("Failed to set the status flags");
276  return false;
277  }
278  return true;
279 }

281 void PioneerDriver::setSerialSpeed(termios &settings, int baudrate)
282 {
283  cfsetispeed(&settings, baudrate);
284  cfsetospeed(&settings, baudrate);
285 }
286 
287 bool PioneerDriver::synchronize(PioneerPacket &packet)
288 {
289  int flags;
290  this->getSerialDescriptorFlags(flags);
291 
292  enum {
293  IDLE,
294  SYNCED_ONCE,
295  SYNCED_TWICE,
296  READY
297  } sync_state;
298  sync_state = IDLE;
299 
300  while (sync_state != READY) {
301  switch (sync_state) {
302  case IDLE:
303  packet.command(SYNC0);
304  packet.send(file_descriptor_);
305  ROS_INFO("Sent SYNC0");
306  break;
307  case SYNCED_ONCE:
308  ROS_INFO("Turning off NONBLOCK mode");
309  fcntl(file_descriptor_, F_SETFL, flags ^ O_NONBLOCK) ;
310  packet.command(SYNC1);
311  packet.send(file_descriptor_);
312  ROS_INFO("Sent SYNC1");
313  break;
314  case SYNCED_TWICE:
315  packet.command(SYNC2);
316  packet.send(file_descriptor_);
317  ROS_INFO("Sent SYNC2");
318  break;
319  default:
320  return false;
321  }
322  ros::Duration(0.2).sleep();
323  if (!packet.receive(file_descriptor_))
324  return false;
325  switch (packet.at(1)) {
326  case SYNC0:
327  sync_state = SYNCED_ONCE;
328  ROS_INFO("Received SYNC0");
329  break;
330  case SYNC1:
331  sync_state = SYNCED_TWICE;
332  ROS_INFO("Received SYNC1");
333  break;
334  case SYNC2:
335  sync_state = READY;
336  ROS_INFO("Received SYNC2");
337  break;
338  default:
339  ROS_ERROR("Could not synchronize");
340  return false;
341  }
342  ros::Duration(0.2).sleep();
343  }
344  return true;
345 }
346 
347 void PioneerDriver::parseSynchronizationPacket(const PioneerPacket &packet)
348 {
349  int index = 2;
350  index = packet.getStringAt(index, name_);
351  index = packet.getStringAt(index, type_);
352  index = packet.getStringAt(index, subtype_);
353 }
354 
355 void PioneerDriver::closeConnection()
356 {
357  ROS_INFO("Closing connection");
358  PioneerPacket packet;
359  // Send STOP
360  packet.command(STOP);
361  packet.send(file_descriptor_);
362  ros::Duration(0.5).sleep();
363  // Send CLOSE
364  packet.command(CLOSE);
365  packet.send(file_descriptor_);
366  ros::Duration(0.5).sleep();
367 
368  close(file_descriptor_);
369  file_descriptor_ = -1;
370 }
371 
372 void PioneerDriver::sendOpen()
373 {
374  PioneerPacket packet;
375  packet.command(OPEN);
376  packet.send(file_descriptor_);
377 }
378 
379 void PioneerDriver::sendEnable(bool value)
380 {
381  PioneerPacket packet;
382  packet.command(ENABLE, static_cast<int>(value));
383  packet.send(file_descriptor_);
384 }
385 
386 void PioneerDriver::sendPulse()
387 {
388  PioneerPacket packet;
389  packet.command(PULSE);
390  packet.send(file_descriptor_);
391 }
